name: d3-drag
description: Drag and drop SVG, HTML or Canvas using mouse or touch input.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-dispatch:d3,d3-selection:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-drag.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-drag.js -c -m -o build/d3-drag.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-drag.js ../d3.github.com/d3-drag.v0.3.js && cp build/d3-drag.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-drag.v0.3.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-drag.v0.3.js d3-drag.v0.3.min.js && git commit -m "d3-drag ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-drag.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-drag.js build/d3-drag.min.js
